title: Signing of the Declaration of Independence
description: The United States declared independence from Great Britain.

relatedEvents.reason: This event is related to the American Revolutionary War, which includes the Battle of Yorktown.

title: Battle of Yorktown
description: The last major battle of the American Revolutionary War.

relatedEvents.reason: This event is related to the Declaration of Independence, as it was a significant battle in the war for independence.

title: Assassination of Abraham Lincoln
description: President Abraham Lincoln was shot by John Wilkes Booth at Ford's Theatre.

title: Wright Brothers' First Flight
description: Orville and Wilbur Wright achieved the first powered flight.

title: March on Washington
description: Massive civil rights demonstration where Martin Luther King Jr. delivered his 'I Have a Dream' speech.
